changeSet.author: rmemoria
changeSet.sql: create table tmp_resistance (case_id int, substance_id int, exam_date date, primary key (case_id, substance_id));

insert into tmp_resistance (case_id, substance_id, exam_date) select a.id, c.substance_id, b.datecollected from tbcase a inner join examdst b on b.case_id=a.id inner join examdstresult c on c.exam_id=b.id where c.result=1 and c.id = (select min(aux.id) from examdstresult aux inner join examdst k on k.id=aux.exam_id where aux.substance_id=c.substance_id and k.case_id=a.id);

insert into tmp_resistance (case_id, substance_id, exam_date) select a.case_id, (select id from substance where abbrev_name1='R' and workspace_id=c.workspace_id), a.datecollected from examxpert a inner join tbcase b on b.id=a.case_id inner join patient c on c.id=b.patient_id where a.rifresult = 0 and not exists(select * from tmp_resistance where case_id=a.case_id and substance_id = (select id from substance where abbrev_name1='R' and workspace_id=c.workspace_id));

insert into caseresistancepattern (case_id, resistpattern_id, diagnosis) select a.id, res.id, false from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id = a.patient_id inner join (select b.id, count(*) as numres, b.workspace_id from resistancepattern b inner join substances_resistpattern c on c.resistancepattern_id = b.id group by b.id) as res on res.workspace_id=p.workspace_id where res.numres = (select count(*) from tmp_resistance tmp where tmp.case_id=a.id and tmp.substance_id in (select g.substances_id from substances_resistpattern g where g.resistancepattern_id=res.id)) and res.numres = (select count(*) from tmp_resistance where case_id=a.id);

insert into caseresistancepattern (case_id, resistpattern_id, diagnosis) select a.id, res.id, true from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id = a.patient_id inner join (select b.id, count(*) as numres, b.workspace_id from resistancepattern b inner join substances_resistpattern c on c.resistancepattern_id = b.id group by b.id) as res on res.workspace_id=p.workspace_id where res.numres = (select count(*) from tmp_resistance tmp where tmp.case_id=a.id and tmp.exam_date <= a.diagnosisDate and tmp.substance_id in (select g.substances_id from substances_resistpattern g where g.resistancepattern_id=res.id)) and res.numres = (select count(*) from tmp_resistance where case_id=a.id and tmp_resistance.exam_date <= a.diagnosisDate) and a.diagnosisDate is not null
